title: I already have an old PBE account, but I can't find the PBE download link anywhere
body: Just for people who are wondering, I wiped my pc clean and lost the PBE launcher. As I already have a PBE account, there should be a way to download it again.

replies.body:
You can find the download links for the Mac or PC PBE Clients in [this guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204894140-Installing-the-PBE-Client)

Let me know if you have any other questions or issues.
